remarks: Hilbert lattice join is the least upper bound of two elements (one direction of ~ chlubi ).  (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ch0le.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chjcl.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chlub.1 $e |- C e. CH $.
chlubii $p |- ( ( A C_ C /\ B C_ C ) -> ( A vH B ) C_ C ) $.
